item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18881)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She‚Äôs been suffering from...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She‚Äôs been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn‚Äôt operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-‚Ä¶. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ‚ù§Ô∏è

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in my film Sanctuary Rising, was in a scary car accident yesterday.

Amazingly she's ok, with family, and recovering nowüíóüíóüíó

Jeanette is going to miss a bunch of work, as well as have medical expenses--I wanted to ask for support from the community to help Jeanette and her kids to get through this difficult time.

...

Please Venmo Jeanette directly: @Sanctuary-4-All

https://account.venmo.com/u/Sanctuary-4-All

Mil Gracias:))) From Theo Rigby

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She‚Äôs been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn‚Äôt operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-‚Ä¶. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Yessenia is expecting her third baby in October, and with the arrival of the new one she might take a step back from solidarity meals. Make sure to get some of her delicious tamales now, orders will be open until Friday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She‚Äôs been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn‚Äôt operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-‚Ä¶. Sanctuary4All Colorado

she has been very active in sanctuary for all for over a year, we need your generosity

item.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado‚ÄéXitlali Baila‚Äé to Awakened 2021 ¬∑ DenverWe are honored to be able to come together with so many great...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado‚ÄéXitlali Baila‚Äé to Awakened 2021 ¬∑ Denver

We are honored to be able to come together with so many great organizations in the community! Utilizing the arts as conduit to help bring awareness about import...ant causes and Resources available for the people~ this is the Awakened mission‚úäüíú
Estamos honrados de poder unirnos con increibles organizaciones en la comunidad! Utilizando las artes como un vehiculo para traer consciencia sobre importantes causas y Recursos disponibles para la gente ~ esta es la mision del Despertar‚úäüíú
September 12th, 2021
5pm Resources and Network
6-8pm Show time
Cleo Parker Robinson Dance
#awakened2021

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado
